definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Swallow 200 micrograms a day of chromium polynicotinate.
sentences.chinese: 每天吞食200毫克的烟酸铬。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method of bacterial endotoxin test for xanthinol Nicotinate Injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立烟酸占替诺注射液的细菌内毒素检查法。

sentences.english: It also prevents pellagra -- a disease that causes weakness, reddish skin and stomach problems. Niacin is found in meat, fish and green vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 烟酸存在于肉类，鱼类及绿色蔬菜中。

sentences.english: A form of niacin called niacinamide causes little or no flushing.
sentences.chinese: 表格烟酸称为烟酰胺原因很少或根本没有冲洗。

sentences.english: The current technology for microbial hydroxylation of nicotinic acid is a procedure of resting cells transformation.
sentences.chinese: 现有微生物羟基化烟酸采用的是静息细胞转化工艺。

sentences.english: The cat cannot synthesise sufficient nicotinic acid from tryptophan.
sentences.chinese: 猫无法从色氨酸中合成足够的烟酸。

sentences.english: Niacin is one of the most stable of the B-vitamins.
sentences.chinese: 烟酸是最稳定的B族维生素中的一种。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare nicotinic acid micropellet and to research the release rate.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备烟酸微丸并考察其溶出度。

sentences.english: It also has lactoflavin and nicotinic acid, which can help reduce insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒也含有乳黄素和烟酸，有助于减少失眠。

sentences.english: Niacinamide is the biologically active form of niacin.
sentences.chinese: 烟酰胺是烟酸的生物活性形式。

sentences.english: Nicotinic acid ethyl ester are applied widely in synthesis of medicines andinsecticides.
sentences.chinese: 烟酸乙酯类化合物在医药合成中得到了广泛的应用。

sentences.english: The only appreciable loss of niacin occurs when it leaches into cooking water.
sentences.chinese: 当溶入烹调水中，仅烟酸的损失发生。

sentences.english: In order to observe the curative effect of bezafibrate.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察苯扎贝特与烟酸肌醇脂的降脂疗效。

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
variant of 菸鹼酸|菸碱酸[yan1 jian3 suan1]/niacin
